item.title: Achievements
item.description: 2024 Position CTF Date 18 HTB University CTF 2024: Binary Bandlands 13/12 - 15/12 (56h) 🥇 Airbus Cyber Days CTF 15/11 (8h) 64 BRICS+ CTF Quals 2024 05/10 - 06/10 (24h) 28 SekaiCTF 2024 23/08 - 25/08 (48h) 17 corCTF 2024 27/07 - 29/07 (48h) 36 Crypto CTF 2024 08/06 - 09/06 (24h) 🥉 JNIC CTF 2024 17/05 - 20/05 (72h) 7 Cyber Apocalypse 2024: Hacker Royale 1 09/03 - 14/03 (120h) 🥇 HackOn CTF 2024 16/02 - 18/02 (48h) 25 0xL4ugh CTF 2024 09/02 - 10/02 (24h) 70 DiceCTF 2024 02/02 - 04/02 (48h) 10 TetCTF 2024 27/01 - 29/01 (48h) 2023 Position CTF Date 15 HTB University CTF 2023: Brains & Bytes 08/12 - 10/12 (56h) 🥇 Tarlogic Halloween CTF 31/10 - 02/11 (48h) 60 Crypto CTF 2023 07/07 - 08/07 (24h) 16 Cyber Apocalypse 2023: The Cursed Mission 18/03 - 23/03 (120h) 2022 Position CTF Date 41 HTB University CTF 2022: Supernatural Hacks 02/12 - 04/12 (54h) Merged with Watch4Hack ↩︎
